archimate:BusinessObject.name: Currency
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Represent the currency in reality. Currency uses 1 or more CurrencyUnits. For example, Currency(code=CNY, symbol= ï¿¥) use three CurrencyUnits(Yuan, Jiao, Fen).Currency is associated to CurrencyExchangeRate with CurrencyUsedAsSource and CurrencyUsedAsDestination. Currency can be used in different Countrys.
